languages.text: {n}Проктор уважительно кивает вам.{/n} "Не только разобрались с неисправным аугментом, но и одним лишь взглядом заставили бестию признать свой авторитет. Интересно, чем теперь аукнется освобождение зверя..."

{n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор уважительно кивает вам.{/n} "Не только разобрались с неисправным аугментом, но и одним лишь взглядом заставили бестию признать свой авторитет. Интересно, чем теперь аукнется освобождение зверя..."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙向你点头，充满了敬意。{/n}“你不仅修好了植入物，还让那头致命的野兽一眼认出了你的权威。话虽如此，我还是不禁担心这场越狱会带来怎样的后果……”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙向你点头，充满了敬意。{/n}“你不仅修好了植入物，还让那头致命的野兽一眼认出了你的权威。话虽如此，我还是不禁担心这场越狱会带来怎样的后果……”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne asiente con la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «No solo ha arreglado la avería del aumético, también ha conseguido que una bestia asesina reconozca su autoridad con una sola mirada. Aunque no puedo evitar plantearme las posibles repercusiones de su fuga...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne asiente con la cabeza en señal de respeto.{/n} «No solo ha arreglado la avería del aumético, también ha conseguido que una bestia asesina reconozca su autoridad con una sola mirada. Aunque no puedo evitar plantearme las posibles repercusiones de su fuga...».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne başıyla seni saygıyla selamlıyor.{/n} "Ogmetiği halletmekle kalmadınız, aynı zamanda ölümcül bir hayvana tek bir bakışla otoritenizi kabul ettirdiniz. Yine de bu kafes kaçağının sebep olacağı yankıları merak etmeden duramıyorum..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne başıyla seni saygıyla selamlıyor.{/n} "Ogmetiği halletmekle kalmadınız, aynı zamanda ölümcül bir hayvana tek bir bakışla otoritenizi kabul ettirdiniz. Yine de bu kafes kaçağının sebep olacağı yankıları merak etmeden duramıyorum..."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、尊敬するように頷く。{/n}「オーグメントを処理しただけでなく、人目の前であなたの権威をあの猛獣に認識させました。しかし、この脱獄の影響については、考えをめぐらせずにはいられません…」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、尊敬するように頷く。{/n}「オーグメントを処理しただけでなく、人目の前であなたの権威をあの猛獣に認識させました。しかし、この脱獄の影響については、考えをめぐらせずにはいられません…」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un signe de tête empreint de respect.{/n} « En plus d'avoir réparé l'augmétique de cette créature, vous avez su lui imposer votre autorité d'un simple regard. Cela dit, je ne peux m'empêcher de m'inquiéter des éventuelles répercussions que pourra avoir son évasion... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un signe de tête empreint de respect.{/n} « En plus d'avoir réparé l'augmétique de cette créature, vous avez su lui imposer votre autorité d'un simple regard. Cela dit, je ne peux m'empêcher de m'inquiéter des éventuelles répercussions que pourra avoir son évasion... »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt dir respektvoll zu.{/n} "Ihr habt nicht nur die Augmentation repariert, sondern auch mit einem einzigen Blick ein tödliches Tier Eure Autorität erkennen lassen. Wobei ich mich schon frage, welche Konsequenzen dieser Ausbruch wohl haben wird ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives you a nod of respect.{/n} "Not only did you deal with the augment, you also made a deadly beast recognise your authority with a single glance. Though, I cannot help but wonder about the repercussions of this jailbreak..."
